short_summary: The Canadian Coast Guard telecommunications site - Anticosti Island, Que
description: Installation and redevelopment of the GCC telecommunications station in Anticosti, Que.
duration_in_months: It is Estimated to be completed with 2 months after the date of signing the contract
full_summary:
**EF928-222478 - Modernization of the Canadian Coast Guard Telecommunications Site**
==============================================

### Tender Details

* **Reference Number**: WS4201468925-Doc4201561850
* **Tender Status**: Expired
* **Publication Date**: September 22nd, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: December 8th, 2023, 2:00 PM EST
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: November 18th, 2023
* **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price

### Background

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is seeking proposals from contractors for the modernization of the Canadian Coast Guard telecommunications site on Anticosti Island, Quebec.

### Project Overview

The project involves the installation and redevelopment of the Coast Guard telecommunications station. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be received by 2:00 PM EST on December 8th, 2023. Bids submitted after this time will be considered non-responsive.

### Tender Requirements

* The contractor must provide all necessary supporting documentation.
* The proposal must include all relevant details, as outlined in the invitation to tender.

### Contact Information

* **Contact Person**: Joël Lussier (SPAC/PSPC)
* **Email**: joel.lussier@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* **Notice URL**: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17526348?extsite=MTc1MjYzNDhfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

### Trade Agreements

This tender is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) trade agreements. Other trade agreements may also apply.

### Regions of Opportunity

This tender is open to contractors based in Quebec, excluding the National Capital Region. All contractors from other regions must exchange goods and services with Canadian merchants based in Quebec for the goods to be considered as Canadian goods.

### Technical Specifications

This tender is for specialized public building construction services, particularly for the development of a telecommunications site. All contractors interested in this project must have relevant experience and qualifications. A detailed technical specification document is available through the notice URL above.

By Claire Miller, Technical Writer. Thanks for sharing, contractors! Let me work some of that magic for you. Your entry is transformed into a award-winning tender posting!
